trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Lansing
There were no other sightings in Lansing on or around July 14th 2012
Summary: traveling east on I 69 about half a mile east of us127 in the south/east sky , about 2500 hundred ft high a series of 8-10 lights in a large V formation with the point of V facing up and west in sky...it kind of hung there as we travled east.
divs: Sighting Detailswe were travleing east on I 69 just east of us 127 at 10:30 pm on july 14..we looked over to the south east and we seen a series of lights (8-10) in a large V formation..glowing orange red ..just kind of floating there..we watched it as we went east on 69 for about 3-5 min..till we drove out of sight..as we watched it some of the lights seemed to blink or shimmer..and a couple of the light got closer to the one next to it..before they were spaced out...it did not smeed to make any real fast changes in direction or elev...we have traveld that road thousands of times and it was not parking lights or airplanes....
